title: Second run
author: VD
content_html: I heard from my editor at WND Books yesterday. It seems that RGD has been “doing very well” and is going into its second print run. I don’t know if I’ll have a chance to correct the errata or not, but I have requested the opportunity to do so. I would like to thank all of you who supported that first foray into writing about economics.
content_text: I heard from my editor at WND Books yesterday.  It seems that RGD has been “doing very well” and is going into its second print run.  I don’t know if I’ll have a chance to correct the errata or not, but I have requested the opportunity to do so.  I would like to thank all of you who supported that first foray into writing about economics.
